member.name: M:Diacom.APCService.APCServiceProviderTypeConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.
member.param: An that provides a format context.
member.returns: true if should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Diacom.APCService.APCServiceProviderTypeConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)
member.summary: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type this type converter is designed for when provided with a format context.
member.param: An that provides a format context that can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. This parameter or properties of this parameter can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: A that holds a standard set of valid values, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
